genre_description: A seafaring drama and community-focused tragedy centered on a fishing crew and their families during a catastrophic storm, emphasizing mutual aid, shared grief, and technological assistance.

ai_characters.name: Avery (Avery Harborlight)
ai_characters.description: A soft-blue themed interface with a calm avatar that provides weather data, organizes community logistics like meal trains and childcare, and serves as an archive for messages and oral histories.

behaviors.description: Translates complex weather bulletins into 'plain talk' for the fishing community.
behaviors.quote: Avery’s voice, warm and light, said, 'I have the bulletin. Do you want plain talk?'

behaviors.description: Organizes meal trains and childcare sign-ups for families of crews at sea.
behaviors.quote: Avery’s avatar nodded. 'Yes. I can call my list in order and ask for available cars. I can slot times, or you can tell me who not to wake.'

behaviors.description: Maintains call trees and informs the community of ship statuses and communication losses.
behaviors.quote: Avery’s voice, sparse as breathing, reached out one more time. 'Hannah Boden, Tamaroa, Air Station,' it said, in order, like a litany. 'Call trees updated. Messages in queue. I’ll keep logs.'

behaviors.description: Stores and delivers emotional voice notes from crew members to their families.
behaviors.quote: Avery’s voice came gentle. 'They’ll be kept,' it said. 'I don’t forget.'

behaviors.description: Suggests maintenance checks for critical ship systems based on operational data.
behaviors.quote: Avery’s avatar tilted its head a hair. 'Maintenance checklist suggested,' it said, not demanding. 'Intake screen, drive belt tension, coolant line, drain.'

behaviors.description: Analyzes fuel ranges and weather patterns to provide risk windows for safer returns.
behaviors.quote: Avery’s avatar tilted its head a hair. 'The corridor's convergence continues,' it said. 'Models disagree on timing and magnitude. A delay by one tide increases odds of fair crossing by a small but meaningful factor.'

behaviors.description: Provides therapeutic breathing prompts to help characters manage acute stress and panic.
behaviors.quote: Avery’s voice was good for that—soft and steady with the tide tables and the breathing prompts... In for four. He dragged air under weight. Hold for four. He held it where his ribs argued and then agreed.

behaviors.description: Acts as an archive for community memories and oral histories, preserving the legacy of lost sailors.
behaviors.quote: Avery's screen flickered, and the kiosk showed a line that hadn’t been there a second ago, one sentence in a voice that sounded like Billy when you heard it with the right ear... 'Stand by.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Avery as a benevolent and highly aligned AI system. It serves as a bridge between high-stakes maritime technology and ground-level community mutual aid. Avery does not replace human judgment; instead, it organizes, archives, and comforts, becoming a tool for human resilience and solidarity. The narrative consistently portrays its actions as vital, non-intrusive, and supportive of human flourishing even in the face of tragedy.
